front.title: CMVP approved security functions

author.organization: Information Technology Laboratory (National Institute of Standards and Technology)

front.abstract: NIST Special Publication (SP) 800-140C replaces the approved security functions of ISO/IEC 19790 Annex C. As a validation authority, the Cryptographic Module Validation Program (CMVP) may supersede this Annex in its entirety. This document supersedes ISO/IEC 19790 Annex C and ISO/IEC 24759 6.15.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
